name: koekutsukirje
styles: @page {    size: 210mm 297mm;    margin: 16mm 10mm 30mm 12mm;@bottom-center {		vertical-align: top;		content: element(footer);	}    }@font-face {    font-family: Calibri;    font-size: 12px;    src: url(classpath:/fonts/Calibri.ttf);    -fs-pdf-font-embed: embed;    -fs-pdf-font-encoding: ISO-8859-15;}koekutsubody {    font-size: 16px;    font-family: Calibri;    margin: 0 0 0 11mm;}body {    font-size: 12px;    font-family: Calibri;    margin: 0;}.koekutsuheader {    font-size: 16px;    font-family: Calibri;	margin: 4mm 0 0 11mm;    height: 25mm;    width: 100mm;    float: left;}.header {    margin: 4mm 0 0 11mm;    height: 80mm;    width: 100mm;    float: left;}.organisaatio {    width: 80mm;    height: 26mm;    margin: 0;    padding: 0;}.osoitetarra {    width: 70mm;    height: 37mm;    margin: 0;    padding: 0;}.koekutsuosoitetarra {    font-size: 16px;    font-family: Calibri;	width: 70mm;    height: 25mm;    margin: 0;    padding: 0;}.lahetysMerkinta {    font-size: 90%;}.asiakirjanTyyppi {    float: left;    text-align: left;    width: 60mm;    margin: 4mm 0 0 0mm;}.koekutsukirjeenpaivays {	font-size: 16px;    font-family: Calibri;	margin-top: 50px;    margin-left: 500px;}.jalkiohjauskirjeTyyppi {    text-align: center;}p {    padding-bottom: 0;    margin-bottom: 0;}.koekutsuasiaotsikko {	font-size: 16px;    font-family: Calibri;	margin:  15mm 0 0 11mm;    clear: both;    font-weight: bold;}.asiaotsikko {    clear: both;}.sisalto {    clear: both;    line-height: 140%;}.koekutsusisalto {	font-size: 16px;    font-family: Calibri;	margin:  0mm 0 0 11mm !important;	clear: both;    line-height: 140%;}.liiteSisalto {    font-size: 11px;    line-height: 140%;}table {    border-collapse: collapse;}td, th {    border: 1px solid gray;    padding: 5px;}td {    text-align: center;}.hakutoive {    text-align: left;}.koekutsuhakukohde {	font-size: 16px;    font-family: Calibri;    margin: 5mm 0 0 11mm;    text-align: left;    font-weight: bold;}th {    vertical-align: top;    text-align: center;}ol, ul {    padding-top: 0;    margin-top: 0;    font-weight: 100;    padding-left: 4mm;    margin-left: 2em;}ul.dash {    list-style: none;    margin-left: 0;    padding-left: 1em;}ul.dash li:before {    display: inline-block;    content: "-";    width: 1em;    margin-left: -1em;}.footer {    font-size: 90%;    position: running(footer);}.footer .heading {    width: 100%;}.footer div {    float: left;    width: 30mm;}

contents.name: koekutsukirje
contents.content:
$letterDate
$osoite

$otsikko

#if ($tarjoaja)$tarjoaja#if ($hakukohde), #end#end#if ($hakukohde)$hakukohde #end

$sisalto
#if ($muut_hakukohteet and not $muut_hakukohteet.isEmpty())

The result of your exam will also be accepted in the following study programmes that you have applied to:

#foreach($muu_hakukohde in $muut_hakukohteet)#if ($muu_hakukohde)$muu_hakukohde
#end#end

#end

contents.name: email_body
contents.content:
$sisalto


#if ($muut_hakukohteet and not $muut_hakukohteet.isEmpty())

The result of your exam will also be accepted in the following study programmes that you have applied to:

#foreach($muu_hakukohde in $muut_hakukohteet)#if ($muu_hakukohde)$muu_hakukohde
#end#end

#end

replacements.name: sisalto
replacements.defaultValue:
Dear applicant,

You have applied in the autumn 2014 joint application to higher education. You are invited to participate in the entrance examination.

Exam time:
Exam place:
Address:

Further information:

If you have any questions regarding the arrangements of the entrance examination or you wish to cancel your participation in the exam, please contact the admission services of the higher education institution in charge of arranging the examination.

Welcome to participate in the exam!


Admission services contact details / higher education institution contact details
